name: tour
description: A simple, minimalist touring and on-boarding library for javascript

scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js
scripts.watch-js: onchange src/tour.js -- browserify src/tour.js > dist/tour.js --debug --standalone Tour -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -t uglifyify
scripts.build-js: browserify src/tour.js > dist/tour.js --standalone Tour -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -t uglifyify

author: Tanner Linsley <tannerlinsley@gmail.com>
